__e: Anyone in this room in a position to disprove that?
Dad, you can't deny he's the one person in this family who's been trying to change.
There is zero point denying you went to the motel the other night to sleep with a girl you thought was only 15.
You can't deny that everything Mom told me to do was the right thing.
And I know you've moved on with your life, I get it. But you can't deny that something real and honest happened that night.
That's too good to be true. And even if it's only partly true, there's no getting around the fact that since they showed up, the tide has turned.
I don't deny the fact, from looking at the picture, that that's the same girl.
If you're going to deny it, don't waste my time, just shut up.
You can't get around the fact that people who carry guns tend to get shot more than people who don't.
I think that it's narrow-minded to discount the possibility of life outside of this solar system, yes... Sir.
You just choose to deny the fact, but there's still time.
Ellen, I'm trying to find answers about who I am. My brother means well, but he can't protect me from that.

Or maybe someone said 10 for a joke and then denied it later.
The real sin is for a girl to deny herself life and joy.
But in this one instance, I want to win more than anything else because I want to deny you and Jeremy the chance of watching it. No of fence.
I do a pretty good job of being in denial... about the hopelessness of my condition.
You can deny your issues, or you can commit to therapy and maybe I can help. Oh, please.
All right, but you can't live in denial forever.
I mean, we've been friends for so long, but we just had this one magical night, and we couldn't deny our feelings any longer.
